verses.verse: Now there was <S%H752>long<s%> <S%H4421>war<s%> between the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David:<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>grew<s%> <S%H2390>stronger<s%> and <S%H2390>stronger,<s%> but the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1980>grew<s%> <S%H1800>weaker<s%> and <S%H1800>weaker.<s%>
To <S%H1732>David<s%> were <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H3205>born<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron:<s%> and his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> was <S%H550>Amnon,<s%> of <S%H293>Ahinoam<s%> the <S%H3159>Jezreelitess;<s%>

and his <S%H4932>second,<s%> <S%H3609>Chileab,<s%> of <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H5037>Nabal<s%> the <S%H3761>Carmelite;<s%> and the <S%H7992>third,<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4601>Maacah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H8526>Talmai<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1650>Geshur;<s%>
and the <S%H7243>fourth,<s%> <S%H138>Adonijah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2294>Haggith;<s%> and the <S%H2549>fifth,<s%> <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H37>Abital;<s%>
and the <S%H8345>sixth,<s%> <S%H3507>Ithream,<s%> of <S%H5698>Eglah,<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>'s <S%H802>wife.<s%> These were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>

It <S%H4421>happened,<s%> while there was war between the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> that <S%H74>Abner<s%> made himself <S%H2388>strong<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul.<s%>

Now <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had a <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7532>Rizpah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H345>Aiah:<s%> and Ishbosheth <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H74>Abner,<s%> "Why have you gone <S%H935>in<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6370>concubine?<s%>"

Then was <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H2734>angry<s%> for the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H378>Ishbosheth,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Am I a <S%H3611>dog<s%>'s <S%H7218>head<s%> that belongs to <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> <S%H3117>Today<s%> I <S%H6213>show<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> your <S%H1>father,<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and to his <S%H4828>friends,<s%> and have not <S%H4672>delivered<s%> you into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H1732>David;<s%> and yet you <S%H6485>charge<s%> me this <S%H3117>day<s%> with a <S%H5771>fault<s%> concerning this <S%H802>woman!<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H74>Abner,<s%> and more <S%H3254>also,<s%> <S%H3068>if,<s%> as Yahweh has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> I <S%H6213>don't<s%> do even so to him;

to <S%H5674>transfer<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and to set <S%H6965>up<s%> the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and over <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%>"
He <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> another <S%H1697>word,<s%> because he feared <S%H3372>him.<s%>

<S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> on his <S%H559>behalf,<s%> saying, "Whose is the <S%H776>land?<s%>" and <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3772>"Make<s%> your <S%H1285>alliance<s%> with <S%H3027>me,<s%> and behold, my hand shall be with <S%H3478>you,<s%> to bring all Israel around to <S%H5437>you.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2896>"Good;<s%> I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>treaty<s%> with <S%H259>you;<s%> but one <S%H1697>thing<s%> I <S%H7592>require<s%> of <S%H559>you.<s%> That is, you shall not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> unless you <S%H6440>first<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> when you <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H378>Ishbosheth,<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5414>"Deliver<s%> me my <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H4324>Michal,<s%> whom I <S%H781>pledged<s%> to be married to me for one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H6190>foreskins<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"
<S%H378>Ishbosheth<s%> <S%H7971>sent,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> her from her <S%H376>husband,<s%> even from <S%H6409>Paltiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3889>Laish.<s%>

Her <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> with <S%H1980>her,<s%> weeping as he <S%H3212>went,<s%> and <S%H310>followed<s%> her to <S%H980>Bahurim.<s%> Then <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>him,<s%> "Go! <S%H7725>Return!<s%>" and he <S%H7725>returned.<s%>

<S%H74>Abner<s%> had <S%H1961>communication<s%> with the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "In <S%H8543>times<s%> <S%H8032>past,<s%> you <S%H1245>sought<s%> for <S%H1732>David<s%> to be king over <S%H4428>you.<s%>

Now then <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3068>it;<s%> for Yahweh has <S%H559>spoken<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> 'By the hand of my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> I will <S%H3467>save<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> and out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of all their <S%H341>enemies.<s%>'"

<S%H74>Abner<s%> also <S%H1696>spoke<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> and <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> also to <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> all that <S%H5869>seemed<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5869>and<s%> to the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

So <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> with <S%H1732>him.<s%> David <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> who were with him a <S%H4960>feast.<s%>

<S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> "I will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H3212>go,<s%> and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to my <S%H113>lord<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> that they may <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H4427>you,<s%> and that you may reign over all that your <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desires.<s%>" <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H7971>away;<s%> and he <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

<S%H5650>Behold,<s%> the servants of <S%H1732>David<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from a <S%H1416>foray,<s%> and brought <S%H935>in<s%> a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H7998>spoil<s%> with <S%H74>them:<s%> but Abner was not with <S%H1732>David<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> for he had sent him <S%H7971>away,<s%> and he was <S%H3212>gone<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

When <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and all the <S%H6635>army<s%> who was with him had <S%H935>come,<s%> they <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and he has sent him <S%H7971>away,<s%> and he is <S%H3212>gone<s%> in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>

Then <S%H3097>Joab<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "What have you <S%H6213>done?<s%> <S%H74>Behold,<s%> Abner <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7971>you.<s%> Why is it that you have sent him away, and he is <S%H1980>quite<s%> <S%H3212>gone?<s%>

You <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner,<s%> that he <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H6601>deceive<s%> <S%H3045>you,<s%> and to know your going <S%H4161>out<s%> and your coming <S%H4126>in,<s%> and to <S%H3045>know<s%> all that you <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

When <S%H3097>Joab<s%> had come <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1732>David,<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H74>Abner,<s%> and they brought him <S%H7725>back<s%> from the <S%H953>well<s%> of <S%H5626>Sirah;<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3045>didn't<s%> know it.

When <S%H74>Abner<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%> took him <S%H5186>aside<s%> into the <S%H413>midst<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him <S%H7987>quietly,<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> him there in the <S%H2570>body,<s%> so that he <S%H4191>died,<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> his <S%H251>brother.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>it,<s%> he said, "I and my <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> are <S%H5355>guiltless<s%> before <S%H3068%H99999>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5769>forever<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner.<s%>

Let it <S%H2342>fall<s%> on the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and on all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%> Let there not <S%H3772>fail<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%> one who has an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> or who is a <S%H6879>leper,<s%> or who <S%H2388>leans<s%> on a <S%H6418>staff,<s%> or who <S%H5307>falls<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> or who <S%H2638>lacks<s%> <S%H3899>bread.<s%>"

So <S%H3097>Joab<s%> and <S%H52>Abishai<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H2026>killed<s%> <S%H74>Abner,<s%> because he had <S%H2026>killed<s%> their <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H6214>Asahel<s%> at <S%H1391>Gibeon<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> and to all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H7167>him,<s%> Tear your <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H2296>clothe<s%> yourselves with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H5594>mourn<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H74>Abner.<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> the <S%H4296>bier.<s%>

They <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> in <S%H2275>Hebron:<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> at the <S%H6913>grave<s%> of <S%H74>Abner;<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept.<s%>
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> for <S%H74>Abner,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Should <S%H74>Abner<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%> as a <S%H5036>fool<s%> <S%H4191>dies?<s%>

Your <S%H3027>hands<s%> were not <S%H631>bound,<s%> nor your <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H5066>put<s%> into <S%H5178>fetters.<s%> As a man <S%H5307>falls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> so you <S%H5307>fell.<s%>" All the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> again over <S%H3254>him.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1262>cause<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> to <S%H1262>eat<s%> bread <S%H3899>while<s%> it was <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> but <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7650>swore,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so to <S%H3254>me,<s%> and more also, if I <S%H2938>taste<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> or <S%H3972>anything<s%> <S%H6440>else,<s%> until the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H935>down.<s%>"
All the <S%H5971>people<s%> took <S%H5234>notice<s%> of <S%H3190>it,<s%> and it pleased <S%H4428>them;<s%> as whatever the king <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3190>pleased<s%> all the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

So all the <S%H5971>people<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>understood<s%> that <S%H3117>day<s%> that it was not of the <S%H4428>king<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H74>Abner<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5369>Ner.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H3045>"Don't<s%> you know that there a <S%H8269>prince<s%> and a great <S%H1419>man<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

I am this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7390>weak,<s%> though <S%H4886>anointed<s%> <S%H4428>king;<s%> and these <S%H582>men<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6870>Zeruiah<s%> are too <S%H7186>hard<s%> for <S%H3068>me.<s%> May Yahweh <S%H7999>reward<s%> the <S%H6213>evildoer<s%> according to his <S%H6213>wickedness.<s%>"
